name: Hen
header: Hen is a father from Cambodia who needs $150 so he can see clearly.
description:
Meet Hen, a 52-year old man from Cambodia. “Hen is married with one son and two daughters and likes to listen to romantic Khmer songs and to the news on the radio,” our medical partner, Children’s Surgical Centre (CSC), shares. 

“Hen has hyper-mature cataracts in his right eye that makes it difficult for him to recognize faces, hard to work, and hard to go anywhere by himself,” CSC reports. Cataracts can develop with old age, and if left untreated, can lead to decreased vision and blindness as the lens inside the eye becomes cloudy. While as much as 90% of blindness could be avoided in Cambodia with proper treatment, barriers such as cost limit availability of this treatment.

For $150 we can enable Hen to get cataract surgery on his right eye. “Hen will have restored vision,” CSC continues. “After surgery Hen wants to plant crops around his house, help his wife clean the house, and most of all he wants to stop bothering her when he needs help.”
